name: Locater's Shacknews Tweaks
description: Mostly by Nitrium (awesome dude), classic shack black + yellow, with arial font
css:
/*
Shacknews.com - New site tweaks
This is a set of changes for "new" shack /chatty. Changes include Arial font, black and gold color theme, and etc. Thanks to Nitrium et. all for most of the initial work!
by Nitrium + Locater16
*/

@-moz-document domain(shacknews.com) {

	/*
	general tweaks
	- sets the default chatty font to Arial
	- sets user color to yellow
	- changes the color of the footer to white and sets fonts to Verdana
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap body,
	#chatty_comments_wrap td,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div
	{
		font-family: Arial, sans-serif !important;
		font-size: 12px !important;
	}

	#chatty_comments_wrap .user a,
	#chatty_comments_wrap .oneline_user
	{
		color: #FFDB00 !important;
	}

	#footer
	{
		font-family: Verdana !important;
		margin-top: 0px !important;
		background-color: #000000 !important;
	}
        #chatty_comments_wrap .this_user
        {
	color: #66ccff !important;
        }
	#content + .cb {
		display: none !important;
	}
	
	/*
	re-styles the Shacknews user comment (news post)
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_14475"]
	{
		border-top: solid 1px #089dc6 !important;
		background-color: #11111D !important;
	}

	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_14475"] .postmeta .author .user a
	{
		color: #7cd4ec !important;
	}

	/*
	marks mods with different colors (thanks ThomW and Matt Lindell for the list)
		4      // Steve Gibson
		43653  // Maarten Goldstein
		3259,  // degenerate
		10028  // drucifer
		168479 // ajax
		5334   // dante
		7438   // enigmatic
		169489 // s[genjuro]s
		8105   // hirez
		5278   // lacker
		6674   // pupismyname
		32016  // thekidd
		1194   // zakk
		171402 // brickmatt
		6585   // carnivac
		168256 // edgewise
		169197 // filtersweep
		9980   // haiku
		44583  // jokemon
		3243   // p[multisync]p
		169049 // rauol duke
		8349   // sexninja!!!!
		6933   // tomservo
		9085   // busdriver3030
		8048   // cygnus x-1
		6380   // dognose
		167953 // edlin
		12398  // geedeck
		171127 // helvetica
		7570   // kaiser
		8316   // paranoid android
		9031   // portax
		9211   // redfive
		7660   // sexpansion pack
		169927 // sgtsanity
		15130  // utilitymaximizer
		169942 // mikecyb
		185650 // Dave-A
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_4"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_4"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_43653"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_43653"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_3259"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_3259"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_10028"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_10028"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_168479"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_168479"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_5334"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_5334"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_7438"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_7438"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_169489"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_169489"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_8105"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_8105"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_5278"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_5278"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_6674"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_6674"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_32016"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_32016"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_1194"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_1194"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_171402"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_171402"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_6585"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_6585"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_168256"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_168256"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_169197"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_169197"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_9980"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_9980"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_44583"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_44583"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_3243"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_3243"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_169049"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_169049"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_8349"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_8349"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_6933"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_6933"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_9085"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_9085"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_8048"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_8048"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_6380"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_6380"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_167953"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_167953"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_12398"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_12398"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_171127"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_171127"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_7570"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_7570"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_8316"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_8316"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_9031"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_9031"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_9211"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_9211"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_7660"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_7660"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_169927"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_169927"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_15130"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_15130"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_169942"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_169942"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_185650"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_185650"] .oneline_user
	{
		color: #f39a00 !important;
	}
	
	/*
	marks employees with different colors (thanks arhughes for the list)
	"188134"   // Aaron Linde
	"204735"   // Alice O'Connor
	"213066"   // Jeff Mattas
	"212323"   // Garnett Lee
	"227220"   // Ackbar2020
	"203311"   // greg-m
	"206899"   // ECO
	"223050" // XAVdeMATOS
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_188134"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_188134"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_204735"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_204735"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_213066"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_213066"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_212323"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_212323"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_227220"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_227220"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_203311"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_203311"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_206899"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_206899"] .oneline_user,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_223050"] .user a, #chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="olauthor_223050"] .oneline_user
	{
		color: #4ebeff !important;
	}
}
